articles.author: Gilberto Manzano
articles.title: Four Things We Learned in NFL Week 7: Colts Are For Real, Broncos May Not Be - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Indianapolis has to be considered a leading AFC threat after moving to 6–1. Denver, despite its massive rally against the Giants, doesn’t look as convincing.
articles.content:
I tried my best to avoid calling teams pretenders or contenders the past two weeks because it was still so early in the season.
Football pundits have made a habit of overanalyzing in the first month… [+7853 chars]
